Title: Snow is My Favorite and My Best
Plot: Lola is very excited when she hears that snow is coming. She asks Charlie all sorts of quesions about snow and then stays up late to watch it fall. The next morning, Charlie, Lola, Marv and Lotta have loads of fun playing in the snow --- making snow angels, snowmen and snow-dogs, tossing snowballs, going sleeding and more. Lola, however, becomes sad the next day when the snow melts away.
